s1.message: The following lists the changes compared to Adblock Plus 1.3.8. If you experience issues with this release please check the list of known issues.

s2.message: Added experimental support for Firefox Sync, enabled via "Sync Adblock Plus settings" option (only visible if Firefox Sync is set up).

s5.message: Fixed: Disabled filters might stay effective if enabled from list of blockable items (forum topic).

s6.message: Fixed: Disabling on a page should ignore fragment identifier (forum topic).

s7.message: Fixed: Do-Not-Track feature causes an error message to appear (bug 24078).
